or the control. 在這種情況下，物件傳送至。In such a case, the object is sent to the . 建立處理事件的委派。Create a delegate to handle the event. 處理事件，可讓您的 Web 應用程式繼續執行，即使發生例外狀況。Handling the event allows your Web application to continue to run even though an exception has occurred. 它並不重要的電子郵件訊息傳送時，這非常有用。This is useful when it is not critical to send an email message. 例如，當使用者正在執行一個多步驟的精靈時，就會發生例外狀況，可以記錄錯誤、 application to proceed. 您必須設定屬性`true`來表示已處理，否則為例外狀況，例外狀況重新擲回，並將包含原始的呼叫堆疊和錯誤訊息。You must set the property to `true` to signal that the exception has been handled; otherwise, the exception is rethrown,
